instructions: 面向Abstract Group攤位，準備出發。
直走經過右手邊的XIMEA、XGRIDS、Connection Lounge，約 3 個攤位。
目的地就在前方的 Microserve。

companies.name: Microserve
companies.description: We provide innovative IT solutions to businesses of all sizes. Our services include cloud computing, cybersecurity, managed IT services, and more. Trust our team of experts to help your business stay ahead of the curve with cutting-edge technology solutions.
